dict.acceptation: 从事；使从事（某种事业等）；吸引或引起（注意、兴趣等）；与（某人）交战；

sent.orig: I will engage to manage the business if you will engage to provide the capital.
sent.trans: 如果你答应出资本，我答应经管这个生意。

sent.orig: We decided to engage with the enemy at dawn, unless he bad retreated during the night.
sent.trans: 我们决定黎明前袭击敌人，除非夜里他们撤退。

sent.orig: What is the percentage of the employers who engage in this method of recruiting?
sent.trans: 用人单位中有百分之几使用这种招聘方法？

sent.orig: Engage in a quick conversation with a high-energy colleague.
sent.trans: 与精力充沛的同事进行短暂的交谈。

sent.orig: Online games to inform and engage players about key issues confronting New York City.
sent.trans: 让玩家了解纽约面临的社会议题有哪些，并且参与其中的线上游戏。
